features: 15-count package of gentle, disposable cleansing cloths are convenient for on-the-go and provide a quick, gentle and refreshing cleanse of your baby's skin
Made with Johnson's No More Tears formula, these tear-free cleansing cloths are gentle and mild for use on both the face and body with ingredients that are as gentle to the eyes as pure water
Designed for newborns, these ultra-mild, gentle baby body wipes contain no parabens or phthalates and are hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested
These pre-moistened bath wipes for babies are free of alcohol, soap and dyes providing you with that extra peace of mind when caring for your baby
These disposable cleansing cloths are soft, thick and almost twice the size of a regular baby wipe for a fast, all-over clean without the need for any rinsing or drying
body.description: Gently clean your baby between baths with these convenient, disposable cleansing cloths. Almost twice the size of regular baby wipes, Johnson's Head-to-Toe pre-moistened baby cleansing cloths are designed as a quick, convenient way to give your baby a gentle, all-over clean between baths without the need for water or drying. Made with Johnson's No More Tears formula, these tear-free cleansing cloths are gentle and mild for use on both the face and body with ingredients that are as gentle to the eyes as pure water. Now you can have the gentle cleansing power of a Johnson's bath without the tub, whenever, wherever your baby needs it. Our hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested bath wipes for babies contain no parabens, phthalates, alcohol, soap, or dyes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JOHNSON’S Safety Above All #1 baby skin care brand with best in class global safety process.* At JOHNSON’S, we believe nothing is more important than your baby’s safety. That’s why every product we make is a carefully blended combination of high quality naturally derived ingredients and other carefully evaluated ingredients that ensure the product is safe and best for baby. As the #1 baby skin care brand around the world*, we are also a leader in safety research. And we do all this so you can have peace of mind when using our products, and focus on what matters most, your baby’s healthy development.

Almost 2x the size of average baby wipes Thick, ultra-soft texture Enriched with Johnson's baby lotion Pre-moistened, no water needed The No More Tears formula is mild to the eyes as pure water Hypoallergenic, alcohol free and dermatologist tested Free of parabens, phthalates, dyes, or soaps Not tested on animals Johnson's Head-To-Toe Baby Cleansing Cloths Use Johnson's Head-To-Toe Baby Cleansing Cloths to give your baby a fast and gentle all-over clean between baths. Suitable for even newborns, these disposable baby Cleansing Cloths allow you to gently cleanse your baby's delicate skin without the need for water. The No More Tears formula is as mild to the eyes as pure water, so these baby wipes can even be used on baby's face. Johnson's Head-To-Toe Baby Cleansing Cloths are hypoallergenic, alcohol-free, and contain no parabens, phthalates, dyes, or soaps. These ultra-mild baby cleansing cloths are dermatologist tested and this product is not tested on animals.

Bath Time Whenever, Wherever Sometimes a bath just isn’t possible. That’s whyJohnson's Head-To-Toe baby cleansing cloths are designed as a quick, convenient way to give your baby a gentle, all-over clean without the need for water or drying. Now you can have the gentle cleansing power of a Johnson's bath without the tub, whenever, wherever your baby needs it. Newborn Freshening Even though you may not give your baby a bath every day, make sure that the diaper area is kept clean at every diaper change, and that her face, skin folds under the chin and hands are cleaned after every feeding. Wipes For those times when you’re out and about or when hand washing just isn’t convenient, you can still be comfortable keeping your baby clean and fresh when on the go. Johnson's Head-To-Toe washcloths and Johnson's baby face & hand wipes are perfect diaper bag companions.

Directions: Follow with a gentle massage using Johnson's Head-To-Toe lotion. As your baby grows, she’ll become more independent and start to explore. It’s fun to watch her discover new things, but it also means more baby clean ups. *Based on Nielsen's Baby Toiletries Volume Sales L52 Weeks Ending 25 July 2015.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft Scent, great for baby's sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Great for in between bath times! Gentle, yet effective. Scent isn't too strong. Won't dry babies skin. Nice size and decent moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These work great and have a nice, gentle smell. I use them to wipe my baby up a little when it’s not a bath day. Or when she smells like spit up. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These smell so good and are much bigger than your average wipe. Perfect for a quick "clean up".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Diaper bag Must Have
reviews.reviewText: Love these wipes! keep them in my travel bag, and diaper bag. They are perfect for a big poop out and about, and also to keep around in your car if you get unexpectedly sweaty or for the unexpected messy treat for kiddos. they are large, and have a mild smell. durable enough to last up against a toddler on a sugar high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and convenient but wash to strong in smell
reviews.reviewText: These came in handy for travel. Our little one,2.5 months old, tends to spill or spit up a little during feeding and these helped clean her up. She's also a bit hot in nature so wiping her between baths during the day is good. It is very soft and large in size. I've used it myself just to see and it was nice. The scent is very very very strong for us. Wish the scent was lighter, much much lighter. We're not able to use this on baby's face, neck, hair or hands. We just used on her body, legs and feet. I only used on arm and underarm. If you have sensitive skin, like us, the scent may be bothersome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Freshen up tool
reviews.reviewText: The scent is good and the sizeis nice , but they are a little pricey. Price needs to go down or amount needs to increase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Largest wipe I’ve found
reviews.reviewText: I like the larger than normal size, light fragrance- more suitable for adults, or big cleanup on a baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great for travel with kids (or without) to the beach, park etc. and also in between baths for its bitty ones.
Used these after a couple of surgeries when I was told not to shower for a week. Used it to freshen up each night - and it did the job of a pseudo-shower.
